#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
  int n, q, b;
  scanf("%d", &n);
  int a[n];
  for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
	scanf("%d", &a[i]);
  sort(a, a+n);

  scanf("%d", &q);
  for(int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
	scanf("%d", &b);
	int L = 0, R = n-1;
	for(int i = 20; i >= 0 && L < R; i--) {
	  if(((a[L]>>i)&1) == ((a[R]>>i)&1))
		continue;
	  int l = L, r = R;
	  while(r - l > 1) {
		int m = (r+l)/2;
		if((a[m]>>i)&1) r = m;
		else l = m;
	  }
	  if((b>>i)&1) R = l;
	  else L = r;
	}
	printf("%d\n", b^(a[L]));
  }
  return 0;
}
